%%{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}}}%%
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant User as ğŸ‘¤ User
    participant Browser as ğŸŒ Browser Panel
    participant Webview as ğŸ“± Webview
    participant Proxy as ğŸ” Proxy Monitor
    participant Protocol as ğŸ“œ Protocol Handler
    participant Packet as ğŸ“¦ Packet Analysis
    participant GameState as ğŸ® Game State
    participant UI as ğŸ–¼ï¸ Traffic UI
    participant Session as ğŸ“¹ Session Recorder
    participant MCP as ğŸ¤– MCP (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    
    Note over User,MCP: Traffic Capture Flow
    
    User->>Browser: Interact with game
    Browser->>Webview: User action
    Webview->>Proxy: HTTP/AMF Request
    
    rect rgb(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        Note over Proxy,Protocol: Request Interception
        Proxy->>Proxy: Capture headers & body
        Proxy->>Protocol: Raw packet data
        Protocol->>Protocol: Detect AMF3 format
        Protocol->>MCP: decode_packet(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
        MCP-->>Protocol: Decoded structure
        Protocol->>Packet: Decoded packet
    end
    
    rect rgb(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        Note over Packet,GameState: State Extraction
        Packet->>Packet: Identify action type
        Packet->>GameState: Update game state
        GameState->>GameState: Track cities, heroes, troops
    end
    
    rect rgb(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
        Note over UI,Session: UI & Recording
        Packet->>UI: Traffic entry
        UI->>UI: Add to traffic list
        UI->>UI: Update counters
        
        alt Recording Active
            Packet->>Session: Record packet
            Session->>Session: Add to session buffer
        end
    end
    
    Proxy-->>Webview: Forward request
    Webview-->>Browser: Response
    
    Note over User,MCP: Response Capture Flow
    
    Browser->>Proxy: Server response
    Proxy->>Protocol: Response packet
    Protocol->>MCP: decode_packet(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    MCP-->>Protocol: Decoded response
    Protocol->>Packet: Decoded response
    Packet->>GameState: Update state
    Packet->>UI: Response entry
    
    Note over User,MCP: Analysis Features
    
    User->>UI: Click traffic entry
    UI->>Packet: Get packet details
    Packet->>UI: JSON + Hex + Headers
    UI->>UI: Display in tabs
    
    User->>UI: Request analysis
    UI->>MCP: analyze_traffic(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    MCP-->>UI: Patterns & statistics
    UI->>UI: Display analysis
